text: Lee Grinner Pace (born March 25, 1979) is an American actor. He was born in Chickasha, Oklahoma and grew up in Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, and United Arab Emirates for his father's oil business. After returning to the United States, he lived in Texas and now lives in Los Angeles. Category:Actors from Oklahoma Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:LGBT people from Oklahoma
title: Lee Pace
